| Q | A |
| :--- | :---: |
| Issue ? | https://github.com/abenevaut/laravel-settings/issues/<NUMBER> |
| Depends on pull requests ? | No / #PR1[, #PR2...] |
| Embeds pull requests ? | No / #PR1[, PR2...] |
| Is it automatically tested ? | Yes / No |
| Contains unit tests ? | Yes / No |
